document_data.title: The Guns of Azzagrat

document_data.mainbody: '''''The Guns of Azzagrat''''' is an adventure in the [[Living City]] organized play campaign for 2{{nd}} edition {{dnd}} published in 1999. Written by [[Erik Mona]], it is the finale of the Ebon Tendrils series and features four rounds in total; two per difficulty level.
document_data.Index:
This adventure contains four rounds in three separate documents, which are indexed separately on these subpages:
* [[The Guns of Azzagrat/The Brigadier|The Brigadier]] (Low Tier Round 1)
* [[The Guns of Azzagrat/A Celestial Crown|A Celestial Crown]] (Low Tier Round 2)
* [[The Guns of Azzagrat/The Quarry of Ebulon|The Quarry of Ebulon]] (High Tier Rounds 1 & 2)
